Text: As of next week, from the OLN network, it was announced that OLTL will only air on Tuesday and Thursday. AMC will air on Monday and Wednesday.Friday airing remains the same.
Friday will combine the AMC and OLTL "More" shows.
thanks mickedee77, are you going to put up the friday shows?
Hi disneydreams, yes, Fridays eps are coming. Been a bit busy with work and everything else and haven't had time to edit them. They should be up soon.
